## get() function

Gets the value at path of object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function get<TResult = any>(obj: any, path: string, defaultValue?: TResult): TResult | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | any | The object to search for data |
|  path | string | Path to the data to get |
|  defaultValue | TResult | Optional default value |

<b>Returns:</b>

TResult \| undefined

The value which has been found at the given path

## Remarks

If provided path does not exists inside the object js will generate error.
